data.text: @TheTalkCBS He was working when the Watts riots broke out and his back was broken. I knew what he meant when he asked why. I finally said we got so much. He asked if I didn't like the Christmases before, and told me it doesn't matter how many presents. It's about love and being together. ❤

@TheTalkCBS My Dad almost died when I was 7. His settlement check came and we had tons of presents plus bikes. I was so excited and said it was the best Christmas ever. He asked why. I felt ashamed. The best gift was having him with us and learning it's about family and love. #EverybodyTalks

@TheTalkCBS My now ex husband, gave me a big family Bible, our 1st Christmas together as a married couple. I have recorded life events such a births, marriages and deaths in it and hope to hand it down to my children.
@TheTalkCBS Thank you @TheTalkCBS for the #gift of a ReTweet - Sharing the #gift of #kindness & #happiness - All the best to you 🙏🏻 #EverybodyTalks x https://t.co/tosJTg5oP7
@TheTalkCBS I actually remember Oprah giving Gail that gym

@TheTalkCBS The #gift of #life when my mother gave birth to me. We sometimes don’t appreciate free gifts & sometimes don’t show enough #gratitude - I’m #grateful every day for my #GiftOfLife - Thank you for asking. 🙏🏻❤️#EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS As a black man from Louisiana, who was born in the 70's, I must say that I think that a good gift that Oprah could give to Gayle King, is my damn phone number! haha
@TheTalkCBS The best gift I received was a 25 inch color TV from my dad back in Christmas 1986. It was my 1st apartment & all I had was a black & white! #EverybodyTalks
@TheTalkCBS Haven't gotten many gifts over the years, so can't really say what the best was, maybe a little bit of money when I needed it here or there, not a lot but every little bit helps
